reviewText: Awesome set of movies. In my opinion the best of the DBZ movies with my personal fav Wrath of The Dragon. Great by and a great set.

reviewText: I wanted to buy the whole series so I could watch what I enjoyed as a child. I have not got the chance to watch everything yet but I intend to eventually.
Title: Dragon Ball Z: Movie Pack Collection (Movies 10-13)

reviewText: All the DBZ movies were great, I watched the oringinal DVD releases and the improvement in quality is AMAZING. It also comes with 3 sound options and some trailers. Only gripe about it is that there wasn't any booklets or anything which isn't bad at all, FUNimation replied to emails about that saying there's printable PDF's on their website to stay eco-friendly.
Title: Dragon Ball Z: Movie Pack Collection (Movies 10-13)

reviewText: this was the most thrilling of all the dbz movie feature sets that came in thin packs this last pack is a for sure of any age to watch and have a blast watching with friends and family 5 stars this set was the most u can laugh alot and be serious at the same time any fan that  enjoys all great feelings of life should get this set
summary: all i can say of this dbz set 3 movie feature release epic of all movies and dramatic scary and funny and great action
